Text: iNetEvents Witnesses Resurgence in Event Business in PST iNetEvents Witnesses Resurgence in Event Business in AM LOS ANGELES Jan BUSINESS WIRE iNetEvents Inc IEVT today announced that it has seen a strong resurgence in business among its existing clientele since the decline in activity and bookings of corporate events caused by the terrorist attacks of Sept iNetEvents is currently negotiating contracts with several previous customers including a major West Coast university In addition other important clients including one of the countrys largest banking institutions the law enforcement division of a leading technology company and others have begun to rebook previously cancelled events as well as book new events for iNetEvents is also preparing to launch a series of new Online services that will complement its existing service offerings and broaden its prospective customer base Brandon Stauber iNetEvents CEO said While circumstances at the end of last year were bad we always knew that the overall corporate events market was strong We are now seeing this market return and we are ready to serve it with our superior technology and service About iNetEvents Inc iNetEvents Inc based in Los Angeles develops a range of Webbased software applications designed specifically for the event producer who plans conferences expositions seminars and corporate meetings The companys products enable the event producer to reduce administration costs and time enhance the attendee and exhibitor experience and promote greater interactivity CONTACT iNetEvents Inc Brandon Stauber or Fax wwwiNetEventscom or WPH Consultants Ltd Investor Relations Philippe Niemetz toll free Phone URL Todays News On The Net Business Wires full file on the Internet with Hyperlinks to your home page Copyright C Business Wire All rights reserved Powered by List Builder To unsubscribe follow the link exmanagesubscriberprefscustomeridsubidFABBDDFCmsgnum
